member.returns: The index in the list of rhe record with the recieved id.

member.summary: Returns the list of all records.

member.summary: Returns the stats (the number of records in the list).

member.summary: Returns the list of the records with recieved first name.
member.returns: The list of the records with recieved first name.

member.summary: Returns the list of the records with recieved last name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of the records with recieved date of birth.
member.returns: The list of the records with recieved date of birth.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CheckNames(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the first name and the last name are correct.
member.exception: Thrown if at least one of the names if null.
Thrown if at least one of the names consists of only whitespaces or has length less than 2 or more than 60.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CheckDateOfBirth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Checks if the date of birth is correct.
member.exception: Thrown when the date is less than 1950-Jan-1 or more than today's date.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CheckWorkExperience(System.Int16,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Checks if the work experience is correct.
member.exception: Thrown when the work experience is less than 0 or more than person's age - 16 years.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CheckBalance(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Checks if the balance is correct.
member.exception: Thrown when the balance is less than 0.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CheckFavLetter(System.Char)
member.summary: Checks if the favorite letter is correct.
member.exception: Thrown then the char is not a letter.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.DeleteFromDictionaries(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord)
